title: Dunes
alt: Sunrise over sand dunes in Sossusvlei, Namib Desert, Namibia
description: Sunrise over the dunes of Sossusvlei, Namibia. The soft light reveals the sculpted landscape of the Namib Desert, capturing the quiet magic of one of the world's most surreal landscapes.

title: At the Top
alt: Person climbing Big Daddy sand dune in Sossusvlei, Namibia
description: Climbing Big Daddy dune in Sossusvlei, Namibia. The difficult ascent is rewarded with sweeping views over a sea of sand stretching to the horizon, and the exciting descent into the surreal salt pan of Deadvlei below.

title: Kyoto View
alt: Traditional view of Kyoto city from Kiyomizu-dera Temple, Japan
description: Framed view of Kyoto from Kiyomizu-dera. The traditional architecture of the temple embraces the cityscape below, creating a striking contrast between the ancient structure and the modern skyline.

title: Hazrati Imam Complex, Uzbekistan
description: Hazrati Imam Complex in Tashkent at sunset, capturing the spiritual heart of Uzbekistan's capital.

title: Namib Desert Dunes at Sunrise
description: Golden sand dunes of the Namib Desert captured at sunrise, showcasing one of the world's oldest desert ecosystems.

title: Rural Road Life, Tanzania
description: Daily life on a rural road in Iringa, Tanzania, capturing authentic community transportation and local mobility.

title: Lake Eyasi Family
alt: Portrait of Hadzabe family near Lake Eyasi, Tanzania
description: A Hadzabe family shares a quiet moment by their shelter near Lake Eyasi, reflecting resilience and simplicity in Tanzania’s hunter-gatherer communities.

title: Bukhara Bazaar
alt: Women shopping in Bukhara market, Uzbekistan
description: Women gather at a textile stall in Bukhara's old bazaar, surrounded by vibrant colors and tradition that echo Silk Road history.

title: Sardinia Grazing
alt: Goats grazing near a hilltop in Sardinia, Italy
description: A peaceful pastoral scene of goats grazing on rocky hills under Mediterranean skies in Sardinia’s rugged countryside.

title: Tunis Street Life
alt: Boy riding a bike in the medina of Tunis
description: A young boy glides through a narrow alley in the Tunis medina, merging play with the rhythms of North African city life.

title: Bukhara Doorways
description: Old wooden doors painted in pastel hues line a street in Bukhara, each marking a unique story from Uzbekistan’s architectural heritage.

title: Sunset Walk, Tashkent
alt: Couple walking in the sunset in Tashkent
description: A couple strolls through a sunlit square in Tashkent, a modern moment surrounded by Soviet-era geometry and soft evening light.
